channel.title: How do I take ancients of the empty tab?
channel.description:
I just downloaded Satan's isle cause my other source is fucked up.. There's an ancients altar to change to ancients but ancients is also on the expty tab next to the friends list, how do I change that?
[b]EDIT:[/b] Also... is there a way to make something, so that if someone click more then like twice per second it's sends a message to them, then if they do it again then get automatically banned?

item.title: How do I take ancients of the empty tab?
item.dc:creator: @459_expert 459 expert
item.description:
@459_expert wrote:

in client.java search for

setSidebarInterface

and if you have

setSidebarInterface(7, 1);

change it to

setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);

otherwise add it right below

setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);

so that it will look like

setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);

Read full topic
item.source: How do I take ancients of the empty tab?

item.title: How do I take ancients of the empty tab?

item.source: How do I take ancients of the empty tab?

item.title: How do I take ancients of the empty tab?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

alright, in client.java find this

// here is the place for seting up the UI, stats, etc...

scroll down, you’ll see this

// here is the place for seting up the UI, stats, etc...
		setChatOptions(0, 0, 0);
		for(int i = 0; i < 25; i++) setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]);
refreshSkills();


		outStream.createFrame(107);			// resets something in the client

		setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
              if(ancients == 0)
              {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
              }
              if(ancients == 1)
              {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
              }
setSidebarInterface(7, 1);
setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
setSidebarInterface(9, 5715);
setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
setSidebarInterface(11, 4445);
setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
setSidebarInterface(13, 962);
setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);

you’ll have to experiment to find out which tab it is, but the one u want to be non clickable I do believe. if it doesnt work pm me

Read full topic
